content: *make 1 2 or 3 a drawstring project bag is perfect for supplies extra yarn a work in progress or gift to a maker friend use the same color for all the parts or use accent colors for the drawstring and embroidery * **construction** this project bag is worked in the round on 16 circular needles 2 i-cords are created for each drawstring bag and optional flower embroidery is added to the front **supplies** **yarn needed for 3 bags as pictured ** 3 skeins of lion brand wool-ease yarn in colors arrowood natural heather and blush heather 3oz 85g 197yd/180m ball or similar worsted weight yarn **or** 65g/150yds/138m for 1 bag 5 0mm 16 40 cm circular needles two 2 75-3 5mm double pointed needles tools 3 stitch markers scissors yarn needle measuring tape safety pin **gauge** worked in the round & wet blocked stockinette 18 sts x 24 row = 4x4 10 cm final project size 10x10 25x25 cm **skills** this pattern requires a working knowledge of knitting in the round casting on and binding off experience with i-cord and a folded edge will be helpful
